Name: Independence War™ Deluxe Edition
About the game: It's a sophisticated, interstellar battle for life, and you must fight your way along the path between duty and justice. With luck and skill you can secure a victory for mankind. Includes the original Independence War and and its expansion pack: Defiance. Take command of a 8520-ton, 160-meter long starship - a Dreadnought-class corvette Sophisticated and diverse gameplay featuring detailed ship systems, accurate physics and more
